item.title: Html Css Learning note (0)
item.description: Get start HTML is resonsible for the content of the page. That’s the text, images, buttons, etc. CSS is resonsible for the presentation of the content. That’s the color, layout, etc. Configure VIM as HTML code-editor Add vim plugin: emmet: Coding HTML faster. CSS autocomplete key: <C-x> <C-o> HTML and CSS live previes plugin: bracey urlopen error solution: F**king HTML Anatomy of an HTML element <p> THML is a markup language</p> The HTML element is composed of opening tag, content, closing tag.
